title: Basketball
details: Played competitively for 5 years (2016–2020) on the school team
Qualified for state clusters, finishing 3rd among all South Bangalore schools
Captained the U-14 team, winning silver at the R.A Devi Memorial Cup
Earned 10+ medals at regional and state competitions
Represented state clubs MNKR and JSC at the championship level

title: Debate
details: Ranked among the top 36 speakers in India at ISDS National Camp
Semi-finalist and 4th best speaker at Kumarans Parliamentary Debate (ranked 1st out of 150 teams in prelims)
Winner of Sahodaya Parliamentary Debate, also awarded 2nd best speaker
Ranked 2nd best reply speaker at SGPD
Octofinalist at Aditi PD and Contemplative Dialogue (international)
Qualified through quiz, video, and written rounds for ISDS national-level camp

title: Chess
details: Regular school-level player with focus on strategy and problem-solving
Built logical reasoning and competitive discipline through tournaments
Led a 30-member community advocating for gender equality
Moderated webinars with entrepreneurs
Contributed to Karnataka Coalition advocacy team
Advocated mental health, gender equality, and diversity
Managed 4 Instagram accounts with 1000+ reach
Collaborated with Shashi Tharoor to propagate advocacy work
Moderated live sessions with Girl Up leadership
Mobilized 40+ children to prepare daily meals for migrant workers
Collaborated with ATRIA Foundation for meal distribution
Invited to present at a seminar on pandemic entrepreneurship

title: Cooking
details: Experimented with healthy alternatives to traditional recipes
Created a social media journal documenting recipes and food photography

title: Travelling
details: Explored cultural and historic sites across Scotland and England
Developed adaptability and global awareness through travel

title: Hiking
details: Completed major trails across the Scottish Highlands
Gained endurance, teamwork, and resilience

title: Achievements & Awards
details: The Edinburgh Award (Sept 2024) – for contribution to university web migration (EdWeb 2 CMS)
Jane Street Estimathon Winner (Oct 2024) – 1st place at Edinburgh University
Multiple school awards across debate, athletics, swimming, and leadership

title: Writing & Creative Work
details: Interned at Sleep Deprived Dreamers (20 selected from 250+ applicants)
Wrote and published 10+ articles on college admissions
Offered permanent role as Head of Content Writing for LinkedIn outreach
Won 2nd place in Senior Secondary Creative Writing Fest (180+ participants)
Published articles in newspapers and maintained a personal blog

title: Crafts & Creativity
details: Designed handmade pop-up cards
Created original art and craft-based projects
